channel.title: How to add an object?
channel.description: k so in my staffzone i wanna add a chest or something that staff can click on and get items how and where to i add the obejct id and how do i make it so u get items from it please someone help?

item.title: How to add an object?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“99smitthing, post:4, topic:311298”]if(objectID ==

if you can’t found search for:
Code:

if (objectID ==

Then you should see something like this:
Code:

if (objectID == 7136)
{
	toX = 2208;
	toY = 4830;
}

and now explaination:
Code:

if (objectID == IIII)
{
	toX = XXXX;
	toY = YYYY;
}

XXXX = x Cord
YYYY = y Cord
IIII = Object Id.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 28, 2009, 06:10:14 pm[/size][hr]if(objectID ==

if you can’t found search for:
Code:

if (objectID ==

Then you should see something like this:
Code:

if (objectID == 7136)
{
	toX = 2208;
	toY = 4830;
}

and now explaination:
Code:

if (objectID == IIII)
{
	toX = XXXX;
	toY = YYYY;
}

XXXX = x Cord
YYYY = y Cord
IIII = Object Id.[/quote]

dude, he doesnt want it to tele him somewhere…

item.title: How to add an object?

@xxlukexx wrote:

if(objectID == ###){ addItem(####, ####); sM("txt here."); }

or you may need to make a case.
